12133221.content:
It was a usual day in the forest temple of Hyrule, all was mostly quiet as the monsters that roamed the chambers of the ancient building rested, waiting for an unsuspecting explorer to stumble upon the temple and foolishly venture inside, it was a rare occurrence, but it was almost all that some had to look forward to.
This certain someone was Joelle, the youngest of the four poe sisters. The young ghost girl floated through the corridors, examining the various skulltulas that hung from the ceiling, and the smaller ones that crawled along the walls of the courtyards. Despite her desperate attempts to stave off her boredom, she found herself itching to cause some mischief. But she knew she would get into a lot of trouble.... maybe she would just go see if any of her sisters would play with her?
12133221.title: The Sisters!

choices: "I'll play with you for a bit." (Meg)
"Beth and Amy can look after you" (Beth and Amy)
121332212.content:
She decided that she'd better not risk punishment from Phantom Ganon, who was put in charge of maintaining the curse on the temple. So she decided to fly off to find one of her sisters to entertain her.
As she entered the main room that led down to Phantom Ganon's chambers she saw her other three sisters, Meg, Beth and Amy talking around a torch. Joelle quickly flew down to where Meg was standing and made a sad puppy dog face at her eldest sister.
"Me~~~~~g!" she whined, tugging at Meg's robe, "I'm bo~~~~~~~red!"
Meg rolled her eyes at her little sister's begging, "Well, what do you want me to do about it Jo?" She asked, crossing her arms impatiently as Beth and Amy giggled. Joelle always singled Meg out when she was bored because she spoiled her littlest sister in their youth. Their laughs were stifled quickly by a glare from Meg, but they continued to smirk at her.
"I dunno....." Joelle shrugged, kicking at the air shyly, "But it's been forever since something fun has happened!"
"Fine," Meg replied, "Tell you what, Jo....."
